usage: Ad load distribution across content types

dataMapping.title: Ad Load Distribution Strategy
dataMapping.subtitle: Optimal ad load allocation across content types and viewer segments
dataMapping.totalBudget: Total ad load capacity (e.g., '100% ad load capacity')

allocations.primaryLabel: Content type or viewer segment (e.g., 'Premium Content', 'Standard Content', 'High-Engagement Users')
allocations.description: Ad load allocation rationale (e.g., 'Optimized ad load for premium content viewers')
allocations.budgetAmount: Load allocation (e.g., '30% of total ad load')
insights: Ad load insights and viewer behavior patterns
risks: Viewer retention risks and experience degradation

metadata.lastUpdated: ISO date of last ad load analysis
metadata.dataSource: Load data source (e.g., 'Viewer Retention Data', 'Revenue Impact Analysis')
